webpay

WebPay is payment gateway service in Japan. see also https://webpay.jp/

Requirements
====================================

CPython 2.6, 2.7, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4

Installation
====================================

::

    $ pip install webpay

Usage
====================================

See `Our homepage <https://webpay.jp>`_.

Dependencies
====================================

-   `kennethreitz/requests <https://github.com/kennethreitz/requests>`_

License
====================================

MIT
